column3: Legend
It may not seem like yesterday, but I can remember him not only winning the Nevada City Crit as a Junior, but lapping the field twice!Pretty amazing guy.
i wonder what's greg's ftp and v02max nowadays ..
A legend in his own time.
beautiful film
forget Lemond, are we gonna talk about that guys incredible moustache?
Le Monster!
True legend and innovator of our sport. A signed copy of Greg Lemond’s Complete Book of Bicycling is among my most prized possessions.

Great cyclist and a massive inspiration to me as a teenager watching the races, the best times in Pro Cycling. That final time trial in the 89 Tour was amazing to watch and remember it like yesterday I was 16 but got to be one of the most inspirational things I have seen. Deserves a place in the top 5 sporting moments. Seeing that inspired me to train hard.
I remember watching Greg Lemond and Bernard Hinault riding side by side on Highway 267 in Lake Tahoe. They were both racing The Coors Classic.
Cyclists are funny, aren't they?
Legend. I would love to ride with him and hear the stories.  True athlete
he may have been last up the hills on this video,, but he was first down the hills
a bona fide hero of the sport, whatever country you're from, he's a true pioneer, sportsman and protector of cycling. Legend!
Greg should get on the high carb vegan wagon. I could get him SO lean!
Mighty Lemond.

Greg Lemond was/is awesome. It is such a shame that the shooting accident occurred and got in the way of possibly 2(?) more TdF victories. He is the greatest American rider to date and I am sooooo happy to see his business success with bikes and carbon fiber, etc. Chapeau! BTW another great video by Rapha.
Make that red jersey again please!!
Lemond was my hero back in 1983. The guy who won the Tour D France 3 Times without drugs. I still love him.
The man!
Great  Man & Champion Greg...I love you!
That he nipped Kelly in the sprint blows my mind.
the minute you hear the  name Greg""that 's all it  takes to get it going
Greg Lemond = Legend. Rapha = pretentious bollox
Greg & Rapha = MITO!
Greg LeMond & Bottecchia ...The legend...beautiful video...ciao Greg...forever in my heart
LeMond raced against the Badger!And won the biggest race,,,  the Tour de France!Wow,,,,  he inspired the evolution and revolution of bike racers around the world!Bravo Greg
Lemond is a true legend....
Greg Lemond...the big biker end the big man...
LeMond is LeGitimate.   He's got some great memories to cherish.
A to the D to the R...
Which black Specialized helmet are they riding with?
Awesome spinners.
What a talent he is. Rapha and Greg are an awesome combo!
what is the name of the music on this video
Great vid!

Really great video, lemond has always been the cornerstone for all of us who grew up racing in the early eighties, and still in the future. Great to see him last week on the champs with hinault and merkcx and Indurain!!!!
Greg lemond was my hero growing up. I had his puma poster on my wall.
Lemond da' Bomb. I still ain't gonna buy no Rapha; high class dolla' shit yo!Bam!!!!
Legend!
living legends- remember who you are :-)
The only American to ever win the Tour.
I just love this video
Lemond is a true legend of the sport. But wow, he's gotten a bit chunky..
Brilliance as always!  Glad to see Greg fitting into Rapha, even if its just "barely" ;-)
tileguysuzuki  i feel u man
stay true - ride...
uber

Great video!  Makes me wanna leave work right now and go ride as far and as fast as I can!
as usual rapha you bring purpose back where it was weak and set it in stone for cyclists with films like these. Long live the long ride.
